abstract: Three staff members from Danish Refugee Council, one an American woman, are abducted by Somali gunmen in Puntland; series of such abductions has taken place as the African Union and Kenyan military have battled Islamist extremists in Somalia in hopes of stabilizing the country.
snippet: The Danish Refugee Council staff members were kidnapped by gunmen on Tuesday as Kenyan and other forces waged a military campaign elsewhere in the country in response to previous abductions.
lead_paragraph: The Danish Refugee Council staff members were kidnapped by gunmen on Tuesday as Kenyan and other forces waged a military campaign elsewhere in the country in response to previous abductions.

headline.print_headline: 3 Aid Workers, One From U.S., Are Kidnapped in Somalia
headline.seo: 3 Danish Refugee Council Workers Kidnapped in Puntland, Somalia
